alert.note: Alert for Morrow; Umatilla (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 09 at 5:32AM PDT until May 10 at 7:35PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Oregon and south central Washington, including the following counties, in northeast Oregon, Morrow and Umatilla. In south central Washington, Benton and Klickitat. * WHEN...Until 830 AM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 532 AM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen in the past 3 hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hermiston, Boardman, Stanfield, Irrigon, Echo and Alderdale. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
